context-runner.extension.description: Run custom scripts or commands from context menu with progress and notifications
context-runner.config.scriptPath: Path to the script file that will be executed. If both script and command are configured, script takes precedence
context-runner.config.command: Command to execute when no script is configured. The file path will be automatically added as the last argument, or you can use {filePath} to specify its position
context-runner.config.logLevel: Set the logging level (error, warn, info, debug)
context-runner.info.noFiles: No files found in selected folder
